pkgmetadata.longdescription: Crawler and Scraper for Open Journal System ('OJS') // Crawler for 'OJS' pages and scraper for meta-data from articles. You can crawl 'OJS' archives, issues, articles, galleys, and search results. You can scrap articles meta-data from their head tag in html, or from Open Archives Initiative ('OAI') records. Most of these functions rely on 'OJS' routing conventions (https://docs.pkp.sfu.ca/dev/documentation/en/architecture- routes).
